featured_reviews.review_id: If I could give zero stars I would. Never hire this guy. He quoted a job for $2000 plus when my friends brother in law quoted us after all the headaches Kevin gave us for only $1000. Another part he quoted us we needed replacing for $500 when at Home Depot same part was only for $90. This guy should have his license removed. He ended up flooding our house when he triggered one of the sprinkler. Now thanks to him we are living in a temporary house far from my daughter's school. Believe me Kevin should not be a plumber!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Great experience, and definitely will use again!

Kevin was able to come by today on very short notice.  He installed my dishwasher and garburator in about 1-2 hours time.

He was very friendly, knowledgeable and both items are currently functioning perfectly. The price was very fair for both parties and I am am very happy with the whole experience.

I would recommend Kevin to anyone looking for a residential plumbing services.
